sentences.en: They stumble across a ghost town inhabited by a rascally gold prospector.
sentences.cn: 他们跌跌撞撞地穿过一座鬼城，那里住着一个泼皮无赖的掘金者。

sentences.en: Packer was an American gold prospector and convicted cannibal.
sentences.cn: 帕克是一名美国金矿勘探者及食人犯。

sentences.en: The prospector panned off bits of sand and gravel scooped from the bed of a stream.
sentences.cn: 探矿者淘选从河床中挖出的少量含金泥砂和沙砾。
